definition[0]: a formal meeting in which people who know a lot about a particular subject have discussions about it
definition[1]: a group of articles on a particular subject collected together in a book
definition[2]: a formal meeting in which people involved in a particular business or subject discuss it
example[1]: London will be the venue for the annual symposium.
example[2]: There will be a company-sponsored symposium on degradable plastic and the environment.
